metadata.title: Free Online AI Undress Tool | Remove Clothes from Anyone
metadata.description: Just a click to remove clothes! A powerful and realistic AI tool to reveal nudes in any image. 100% free and unlimited. Try the free AI undress web app now and get instant results!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Undress AI - Protecting Your Privacy
privacy.description: Learn how Undress AI collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy. All uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours and never shared with third parties.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, AI image processing, personal information security, GDPR compliance, data deletion, privacy protection

about.title: About Us | Undress AI - Advanced AI Image Processing Technology
about.description: Learn about Undress AI's mission, technical advantages, and team. We are committed to developing cutting-edge AI image processing technology to provide users with secure and efficient AI services.
about.keywords: AI image processing, artificial intelligence technology, deep learning, image recognition, AI service, technical team, innovative technology

terms.title: Terms of Service | Undress AI - Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Understand the terms and conditions for using the Undress AI service, including user responsibilities, service limitations, intellectual property, and other important legal provisions.
terms.keywords: terms of service, terms and conditions, user agreement, legal terms, service limitations, intellectual property, user responsibilities

contact.title: Contact Us | Undress AI - Get Help & Support
contact.description: Reach out to the Undress AI team for technical support, partnership inquiries, or feedback. We offer 24/7 online support and respond to your needs quickly.
contact.keywords: contact us, technical support, customer service, feedback, partnership inquiries, online support, help center

hero.title: AI Undress Technology
hero.subtitle: Advanced AI for Fast Image Processing
hero.description: Using the most advanced artificial intelligence technology

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Select the image you want to process
upload.processingNote: Your image is being processed using AI technology...
upload.networkError: Network error, please try again later

items.a1: AI Undress is a tool that uses artificial intelligence to digitally remove clothing from people in images or videos. It employs image inpainting algorithms to analyze and manipulate visual data, effectively creating the illusion of a person being undressed.
items.q2: How do I use AI Undress?
items.a2: Simply upload a photo and select the area of clothing you want to remove. The more accurately you mark, the better the results.
items.a3: It depends on server load, so it can range from one second to one minute.
items.q4: Can I use AI Undress for free?
items.a4: Yes, you can use our generator for free with no request limits.
items.a5: The safety of AI Undress depends on user intent. Such tools should be used responsibly to avoid harmful purposes. Always obtain explicit consent before operating on images and use it only for artistic, educational, and non-commercial purposes.
items.a6: All uploaded files are automatically deleted after 24 hours, and generated content is retained for up to 30 days.
items.q7: Are the generated results publicly accessible?
items.a7: No, your generated results are only available to you and will not be shared with third parties.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our AI image processing services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your personal information is handled securely.

dataCollection.title: Information Collection
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following types of information:

items.uploaded: Uploaded image files (used only for processing)
items.technical: Technical information (IP address, browser type, device information)

dataUsage.title: Information Use
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information for:

items.processing: Processing the images you upload to provide AI services
items.improvement: Improving our service quality and user experience
items.support: Providing technical support and customer service
items.security: Maintaining service security and preventing abuse

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We take the following measures to protect your data:

items.encryption: All data transmission is encrypted with SSL/TLS
items.autoDelete: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours
items.accessControl: Strict access control and permission management

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy:
dataSharing.noSharing: We do not share, sell, or disclose your personal information or uploaded images with any third parties.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience:

items.essential: Essential cookies: Ensure the website functions properly
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand website usage
items.preferences: Preference cookies: Remember your language and settings preferences

items.access: Right of access: View the information we collect about you
items.correction: Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate personal information
items.deletion: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your personal information
items.objection: Right to object: Object to the processing of your personal information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us:

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be posted on the website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Undress AI service, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Undress AI provides AI-powered image processing services, including but not limited to image editing, content generation, and image analysis.

items.processing: AI image processing and editing services

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: When using our services, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the services for lawful purposes only
items.consent: Ensure you have the rights to upload and process the images
items.respect: Respect the privacy and rights of others
items.noHarm: Do not use the services for harmful or malicious activities
items.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

prohibitedUse.title: Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.description: You may not use our services for:

items.harassment: Harassment, threats, or harm to others
items.copyright: Infringing on others' intellectual property rights

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: Our services and related technologies are protected by intellectual property laws:

items.ownership: All rights and ownership of the service are held by Undress AI
items.license: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use the service
items.userContent: You retain ownership of your uploaded content but grant us permission to process it
items.generated: Ownership of AI-generated content is determined by applicable laws

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: Regarding the availability of our services:

items.uptime: We strive to maintain high availability but do not guarantee 100% uptime
items.maintenance: We may perform scheduled maintenance and updates
items.interruption: Services may be temporarily interrupted due to technical issues
items.modification: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service

dataAndPrivacy.title: Data and Privacy
dataAndPrivacy.description: Your data processing is governed by our Privacy Policy:

items.processing: We process your data only to provide the services
items.retention: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours
items.security: We take reasonable measures to protect your data
items.sharing: We do not share your personal data with third parties

dataAndPrivacy.privacyNote: For more information on data processing, please refer to our

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:

items.asIs: Services are provided 'as is' without any warranties
items.damages: We are not liable for any indirect, special, or consequential damages
items.liability: Our total liability is limited to the amount you have paid us
items.force: We are not liable for losses due to force majeure events

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: Terms related to termination of service:

items.userTermination: You may stop using our services at any time
items.ourTermination: We may terminate your access for violations of the terms
items.effect: Upon termination, your access will cease immediately
items.survival: Certain provisions will remain in effect after termination

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.description: These Terms are governed by the following laws:

items.jurisdiction: These terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China
items.disputes: Any disputes should be resolved through amicable negotiation
items.court: If negotiations fail, disputes will be submitted to a competent court
items.language: The Chinese version of these Terms is the accurate version

contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

updates.description: We may update these Terms from time to time. Significant changes will be posted on the website. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
